item.title: Changing npc look?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Hey I’m editing a client right now and I’m trying to change what the npc wears, like armour wise, but i’m not sure how to do it. Like I put this in class5 but it didn’t turn out right if(i == 1264){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94[0] = 6684; // arms class5.anIntArray94[1] = 2661; // chest class5.anIntArray94[2] = 2663; // legs class5.anIntArray94[3] = 1303; // Weapon class5.anIntArray94[4] = 4131; // boots class5.anIntArray94[5] = 7613; // gloves class5.anIntArray94[6] = 2665; // helm class5.anIntArray94[7] = 2412; // cape class5.anIntArray94[8] = 9642; // amulet class5.anInt61 = 105; // Level class5.aString65 = "Saradomin Knight"; class5.aByteArray89 = "One of the many followers of Saradomin.".getBytes(); } Could anyone help me?
